graphs.title: Count by serverHost / Tag (Specified)
graphs.query: serverHost contains '#Specified Host#' tag=#Specified Tag# | columns serverHost, tag | group count=count() by serverHost, tag | sort -count | limit 20

graphs.title: Count by serverHost / Tag (All)
graphs.query: serverHost=* tag=* | columns serverHost, tag | group count=count() by serverHost, tag | sort -count | limit 20
